snippet: A man, woman and a child were found fatally shot in Bedford-Stuyvesant in what the police suspect was a murder-suicide.
abstract: A man, woman and a child were found fatally shot in Bedford-Stuyvesant in what the police suspect was a murder-suicide.

byline.original: By WENDY RUDERMAN and COLIN MOYNIHAN

headline.main: Police Find Three Dead in Apartment in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Police Find Three Dead In Apartment In Brooklyn
